How it works

Natural magic inside
Increases the PH balance of water to the optimum level
All major body fluids have a slightly alkaline pH reaction from 7.34 to 7.44
Enriched water with 8 minerals
Minerals (calcium, magnesium, potassium and others) make water curative for health
Cleans water of harmful impurities
Removal of heavy metals, chlorine and water disinfection
Ionizes water
Ions - powerful antioxidants, neutralize free radicals - the perpetrators of aging

According to the results of testing of Korean scientists, The best effect of enrichment and mineralization of water is achieved

from 15 minutes to 3 hours

water infusion in aqua-enrichment

The study of Korean scientists
